heading: Today
text: Chance of snow showers in the north and mountains in the morning, then some sunshine developing in the afternoon. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, 30 to 35 south. Wind turning northwest at 5 to 15 mph, occasional gusts up to 20 mph.

heading: Valentine’s Day
text: Chance of snow showers in the north and mountains in the morning, then some sunshine developing in the afternoon. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, 30 to 35 south. Wind turning northwest at 5 to 15 mph, occasional gusts up to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: A few evening clouds, then becoming mostly clear. Lows from 5 below into the single digits in the north, increasing to near 10 as you head south. Light northwest wind.

heading: Sunday
text: Sunshine, mixing with afternoon clouds from the west. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, in the mid 30s south. Light and variable wind.
